animes.title: Attack on Titan
animes.synopsis: In a world where humanity resides within enormous walled cities due to the threat of Titans, giant humanoid creatures, Eren Yeager joins the Survey Corps to fight back.

animes.title: Spirited Away
animes.synopsis: Chihiro, a 10-year-old girl, becomes trapped in a mysterious and magical world while her parents are transformed into pigs. She must find a way to free herself and her parents and return to the human world.

animes.title: My Hero Academia
animes.synopsis: In a world where nearly everyone has superpowers, Izuku Midoriya, a boy born without any, still dreams of becoming the world's greatest hero.

animes.title: Naruto
animes.synopsis: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a sealed demon fox within him, strives to become the strongest ninja and earn the title of Hokage.

animes.title: Your Name
animes.synopsis: Two teenagers, Taki and Mitsuha, mysteriously begin switching bodies and must figure out how to communicate and navigate their lives as their connection grows deeper.

animes.title: Death Note
animes.synopsis: A high school student named Light Yagami discovers a supernatural notebook that grants him the power to kill anyone whose name he writes in it. He sets out to create a world without crime, but soon faces challenges from a mysterious detective known as L.

animes.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
animes.synopsis: Two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, use alchemy to try to resurrect their deceased mother, but their attempt goes horribly wrong. They embark on a journey to find the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies.

animes.title: Dragon Ball Z
animes.synopsis: Goku, a powerful Saiyan warrior, protects Earth from powerful villains, gathering Dragon Balls along the way to summon a dragon that grants wishes.

animes.title: Sword Art Online
animes.synopsis: Players of a virtual reality MMORPG find themselves trapped in the game, where dying in the game means dying in real life. Kirito, a solo player, must find a way to clear the game and free everyone.

animes.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
animes.synopsis: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered by demons and his sister Nezuko is turned into one. He embarks on a quest to avenge his family and find a cure for his sister.

animes.title: Tokyo Ghoul
animes.synopsis: Ken Kaneki, a college student, is attacked by a ghoul and becomes a half-ghoul, half-human hybrid. He struggles to adapt to his new life while being hunted by both humans and ghouls.

animes.title: One Punch Man
animes.synopsis: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, struggles with boredom and a lack of challenging opponents. Despite his immense power, he remains humble and seeks recognition.

animes.title: Steins;Gate
animes.synopsis: Rintarou Okabe, a self-proclaimed mad scientist, accidentally discovers time travel and becomes entangled in a conspiracy that threatens the world. He must navigate the consequences of his actions to protect his loved ones.

animes.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
animes.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, teenagers piloting giant bio-mechanical robots, known as Evangelions, are humanity's last hope against monstrous beings known as Angels.

reviews.comment: A masterpiece of storytelling and action. The twists and turns kept me on the edge of my seat!
Amazing animation and plot. A bit too intense at times, but worth watching.
A beautiful and emotional journey. The art and music are enchanting.
A classic that stands the test of time. Every scene is a work of art.
A great mix of action and character development. The story keeps getting better with each season.
Some arcs are a bit slow, but overall a solid anime with strong themes of heroism.
An iconic series with memorable characters and battles. The filler episodes can be skipped, but the main story is epic.
A long but worthwhile journey. Naruto's growth is inspiring.
A beautifully animated and emotionally powerful film. The story is both heartwarming and heartbreaking.
A touching tale that explores the connection between time, love, and destiny. Truly a masterpiece.
